description.value:
With a snap of the fingers, a small spark of energy flairs up and attempts to ignite a target that you can see. You make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes 2d6 fire damage, and must make a Dexterity (Save) check.
    On a fail, the target is now on fire and must make a Dexterity (Save) check at the start of each of their turns to put it out. Every time they fail, the target takes 1d6 points of fire damage. A successful save avoids being set on fire.

Charge: This spell can be Charged, increasing the spell’s damage. Costs and increase are as follow:

  • 3 Mana: Initial damage increases by 1d6
  • 7 Mana: Initial damage increases by 2d6, and damage taken from being on fire increases by 1d6
